Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class GUI extends javafx.application.Application implements UserInterface
GUI is the main class of the graphical user interface of the client
See Also:

      Specified by:

      actions - all the actions descriptions that the player can do
      actionCommands - all the actions command to call the actions that the player can do

    • onIslandStudentsUpdate

      private void onIslandStudentsUpdate(Integer islandId, RealmType[] students, boolean fromEntrance)
      Updates the students that are presents on the specified island in the main scene
      Parameters:
      islandId - the id of the island
      students - students that are inserted on the island
      fromEntrance - true if the students are moved from the entrance of the active player, otherwise false

    • onDiningRoomUpdate

      private void onDiningRoomUpdate(String player, RealmType[] students, boolean fromEntrance, boolean isInsertion)
      Updates the dining room of th specified player
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the player
      students - the students that are inserted/removed from the dining room
      fromEntrance - true if the students are inserted/removed from the entrance, otherwise false
      isInsertion - true if students are inserted, otherwise false

    • onProfessorUpdate

      private void onProfessorUpdate(RealmType professor, String lastOwner, String newOwner)
      Updates the specified professor on the main scene by adding it to the school of the specified new owner and by removing it from the specified last owner (if not null)
      Parameters:
      professor - the type of professor
      lastOwner - the last owner of the professor
      newOwner - the new owner of the professor

    • onAssistantUpdate

      private void onAssistantUpdate(int assistant, String player)
      Updates the last played assistant of the specified player by modifying the assistant image near the player school
      Parameters:
      assistant - the is of the assistant
      player - the player who have played the assistant

    • onTowerUpdate

      private void onTowerUpdate(TowerType lastTower, int islandId)
      Updates the towers of the specified island in the main scene
      Parameters:
      lastTower - the tower inserted on the island
      islandId - the id of the island

    • onNoEntryTileUpdate

      private void onNoEntryTileUpdate(int islandId, int characterId)
      Updates the no entry tiles on the specified island on the main scene. The number of no entry tiles of the island is taken from the model view
      Parameters:
      islandId - the id of the island
      characterId - the id of the character that has the no entry tiles

    • onEntranceSwap

      private void onEntranceSwap(String playerName)
      Updates the entrance of the school of the specified player after the specified player has played the character 7
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player

    • onSchoolSwap

      private void onSchoolSwap(String playerName, RealmType[] toEntrance, RealmType[] toDiningRoom)
      Modifies the school of the specified players on the main scene after the specified player has played character 10
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player
      toEntrance - students that are inserted to the entrance from the dining room
      toDiningRoom - students that are inserted to th dining room from the entrance

    • onCoinsUpdate

      private void onCoinsUpdate(String playerName)
      Modifies the coins of the specified player on the game main scene
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player

    • onCloudsSelection

      private void onCloudsSelection(String playerName, int cloudId, RealmType[] students)
      Process a CloudSelection event after a player have picked students from the specified cloud
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player
      cloudId - the id of the cloud
      students - the students that are picked from the cloud

    • onCloudRefill

      private void onCloudRefill()
      Process a clod refill event by adding students to cloud

    • onEndGameEvent

      private void onEndGameEvent(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Handles an end game event by displaying a dialog on the game main scene. The user will be asked if he wants to quit or to return to the main menu
      Parameters:
      evt - the end game event

    • onDisconnection

      private void onDisconnection(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Handles a player disconnection by displaying a dialog on the current scene. The user will be asked if he wants to quit or to return to the main menu
      Parameters:
      evt - the disconnection event

    • checkEventFromControllers

      private void checkEventFromControllers(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Responds to events that come from a FXMLController. The behaviour depends on the name of the event, if the event is a user action, the event will be fires in the listener chain
      Parameters:
      evt - the event fired from a FXMLController

    • doSetup

      public void doSetup(String serverIp, int serverPort, String nickname)
      Performs the setup operations after the user has clicked the submit button on the first scene that contains the server parameters and the username. The method will create a connection to the server.
      Parameters:
      serverIp - the ip of the server
      serverPort - the port of the server
      nickname - the username chosen by the user

    • onError

      public void onError(ErrorMessageType error, String info)
      Notifies the client that an error from the server has occurred. The behaviour depends on the current scene.
      Specified by:
      onError in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      error - the error type
      info - the error description

    • onGameDeleted

      public void onGameDeleted(String playerName)
      Display a dialog on the setup scene to inform that the specified player has decided to not resume the previously saved game. The user will be asked to decide if he wants to quit or to return to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the player who deleted the game

    • returnToMainMenu

      public void returnToMainMenu()
      Returns to the main menu of the game

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Displays an alert to inform that there was an error in the connection with the server, therefore the application will close when the alert is closed
      Specified by:
      shutdown in interface UserInterface
